sentences.sentence: Fraudsters can, of course, be found in any industry.
sentences.translation: 诚然，可以在任何行业中找到骗子。

sentences.sentence: Online fraudsters have tricks of their own, of course.
sentences.translation: 当然，网络欺诈客也有他们自己的花招。

sentences.sentence: Hundreds of terrified fraudsters later, Mr Levine's business is thriving.
sentences.translation: 代理过数百名受到惊吓的欺诈犯之后，赖文先生的生意做得一团红火。
